Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Game.Entities

Class AbstractFigure

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Game.Entities.AbstractFigure
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractBarrier, AbstractBonus, AbstractBullet, AbstractEnemy, AbstractLabel, AbstractPlayer
public abstract class AbstractFigure extends Object
Represents an abstract figure in the Space Invaders game. An abstract figure has position, movement, collision, health, score, size, and sound components. This class provides a base implementation for entities in the game.
Author:
Ahmad Shakleya

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractFigure

      public AbstractFigure(int x, int y, int dx, int dy, int traagheid, int hitboxWidth, int hitboxHeight, int healthValue, int score, int screenWidth, int screenHeight, int size, String soundFile)
      Constructs a new AbstractFigure with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - the initial x-coordinate of the figure
      y - the initial y-coordinate of the figure
      dx - the horizontal speed of the figure
      dy - the vertical speed of the figure
      traagheid - the inertia of the figure's movement
      hitboxWidth - the width of the figure's collision hitbox
      hitboxHeight - the height of the figure's collision hitbox
      healthValue - the health value of the figure
      score - the score of the figure
      screenWidth - the width of the game screen
      screenHeight - the height of the game screen
      size - the size of the figure
      soundFile - the sound file associated with the figure
